name: Streamlabs
0:
”Alexa, tell Streamlabs I'm going away.”
”Alexa, tell Streamlabs I'm home.”
”Alexa, tell Streamlabs to put my monitor at city in away mode.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stream labs
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Streamlabs Water Monitor is always watching for leaks no matter where you are. With the Streamlabs Alexa skill, you can tell Streamlabs when you’re home and when you’re leaving so that Streamlabs can automatically change your leak detection settings.

Now, enjoy peace of mind simply by saying “Alexa, tell Streamlabs I’m going away.” Streamlabs will notify you if it detects any water running in your home while you're away.

Maybe you have a Streamlabs Water Monitor in your primary home and in a vacation home – Not a problem! Just tell Alexa the name of the home that you want to change the leak detection mode. 

For example: “Alexa, tell Streamlabs to put my monitor at city in away mode.”

After you enable the Streamlabs skill, you will need to sign in with your Streamlabs account to complete the setup.

Learn more about the Streamlabs Water Monitor: https://streamlabswater.com/ 

Learn more about what you can say to Alexa: https://support.streamlabswater.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002471594-Amazon-Alexa 

Need help? Visit our FAQ and troubleshooting at http://support.streamlabswater.com or send us an email at support@streamlabswater.com .
